remarks: Describe an implicit one-to-one onto function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
f1od.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> C ) $.
f1o2d.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. B ) $.
f1o2d.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. B ) -> D e. A ) $.
f1o2d.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x = D <-> y = C ) ) $.
f1ocnv2d $p |- ( ph -> ( F : A -1-1-onto-> B /\ `' F = ( y e. B |-> D ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C y $.
$d D x $.
$d ph x y $.
